de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.surf

Class InterestPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.features.surf.InterestPoint

  • public class InterestPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Interest Point class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float[] descriptor
      Vector of descriptor components.
      float orientation
      Orientation measured anti-clockwise from +ve x-axis.
      float scale
      Detected scale.
      boolean sign
      Sign of hessian traces (laplacian sign).
      float strength
      Value of the hessian determinant (blob response) means the strength of the interest point.
      float trace
      Trace of the hessian determinant.
      float x
      Interpolated X-coordinate.
      float y
      Interpolated Y-coordinate.

    • Field Detail

      • x

        public float x
        Interpolated X-coordinate.

      • y

        public float y
        Interpolated Y-coordinate.

      • strength

        public float strength
        Value of the hessian determinant (blob response) means the strength of the interest point.

      • trace

        public float trace
        Trace of the hessian determinant.

      • sign

        public boolean sign
        Sign of hessian traces (laplacian sign).
        true means >= 0, false means < 0. (Signs are saved separately for better matching performance.)

      • scale

        public float scale
        Detected scale.

      • orientation

        public float orientation
        Orientation measured anti-clockwise from +ve x-axis. The default is 0 (i.e. upright SURF).

      • descriptor

        public float[] descriptor
        Vector of descriptor components.
